Comments_List: Such an important course! I would highly recommend this course to any student from any major. It was incredibly interesting, had a very manageable workload, and I learned things that will have a real impact on my life beyond an academic setting.
I developed a greater understanding of gender overall. I'm now more aware of the pronouns I use, of how people treat others around me, and especially of how I come off to/treat others.
I wish more time had been spent on explaining the studies involved with the readings. I feel like they helped me understand concepts really well. Overall it was a great course.
More assignments, same format for midterm as the final.

Such an important course! I would highly recommend this course to any student from any major. It was incredibly interesting, had a very manageable workload, and I learned things that will have a real impact on my life beyond an academic setting. Prof LaFrance is wonderful!
Yes, I would definitely recommend this course to other students because it was intellectually challenging and very interesting.
You won't learn anything radically new, but instead a fuller view of what you already know/assume about gender that is backed by psychology research.
